name: Parallelium (ric0chet)
description:
Legend says that Parallelium was an ancient book written in the 13th century by an unknown author from the middle ages. The unnamed hero from the book was born with the powers to teleport through parallel dimensions. And with these abilities, the unnamed hero is forced to stop all of the parallel dimensions from colliding with each other and causing a Universe catastrophe.

Gameplay

The objective of every level in Parallelium is for the player to step on the light blue glowing tile.  But, in order to reach that tile, he will have to get past some obstacles. The main obstacle that the player will encounter is, a wall, and in order for the player to get past that wall, he will have to teleport to the dimension which doesn't have that wall in the exact same spot.

Controls

Use WASD/Arrow keys to move around, Q to teleport to the previous dimension, and E to teleport to the next one. Press F to activate an item in the inventory, and TAB/1-3 to cycle through the inventory.
